channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: AllSpice’s platform is the GitHub for electrical engineering teams
item.description: AllSpice's platform sits between existing workflow software. It allows hardware teams to collaborate on the types of documents they traditionally work...

item.title: International Nuclear Watchdog Issues Stark Warning in Wake of US Iran Strikes
item.description: “Violence and destruction could reach unimaginable levels” if diplomacy is not pursued, said the head of the International Atomic Energy Agency.
